--- product_code: ls01 description: 10mm Landsknechte with Zweihänder (Great Swords) title: 10mm Landsknechte with Zweihänder (Great Swords) breadcrumb: Zweihänder (Great Swords) name: Landsknechte with Zweihänder (Great Swords) cost: $12.00 paypal_id: TCXNLESZTHB5Q ---

Some Landsknechte Doppelsöldner (double pay-earners) were armed with two-handed swords and charged with sowing disorder amongst enemy pike blocks.

This is a Zweihänder (Great Swords) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve one standard bearer/musician strip (ls01a) and fourteen rank and file strips (a mix of ls01b–h).
